law.catch_line: Exemption of surety on specified bonds.
law.text: No surety shall be required on any bond made for the purpose of the issuance of a temporary restraining order, writ of possession, or order of attachment pursuant to this chapter by any domestic bank, savings and loan institution, or institution which is a member of the Farm Credit System, as defined by 12 U.S.C. Section 2002.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 135, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
